name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FuseBase Clarity - Capture Step-by-Step guides, SOP and tutorials

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically generate step-by-step guides SOPs with a single click of the record button, enhanced by AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,da,en_GB,en_US,et,fa,fi,fil,:
▸ Record any process from your screen, and Fusebase Clarity will automatically create a guide with screenshots and descriptions of actions.
▸ Edit the description with the help of an AI assistant.
▸ Add new elements to the guide using the powerful editor: tips, tables, files, etc.
▸ Share guides with friends and colleagues in just a few clicks or create your own knowledge base.
long.el,en,en_AU,ko,lt,lv,ml,mr,ms,nl,no,pt_P:
Boost your company's efficiency and enhance your personal productivity with our revolutionary AI-powered guide creation tool. Eliminate the hassle of manual documentation—simply record any on-screen process, and our advanced AI instantly generates detailed, annotated step-by-step guides.

▸ Record any process from your screen and Fusebase Clarity will automatically create a guide with screenshots and descriptions of actions.
▸ Record a video of the process, and it will be added to the guide as well.
▸ Edit the description with the help of an AI assistant.
▸ Customize these guides by adding text, files, tables, and more to fit your specific needs. 
▸ Share them effortlessly on a stunning portal with your team or external partners, enhancing collaboration and accelerating knowledge transfer. 

Boost your company's efficiency and streamline workflows with this cutting-edge tool that leverages AI to revolutionize how you capture and disseminate information.
